subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Suzann Pettersen sank a birdie putt from about 6 feet on the second playoff hole to win the Longs Drugs Challenge in Danville, Calif.Pettersen, who began the day with a bogey, watched as Lorena Ochoa barely missed a putt from more than 20 feet before calmly making the winner. Pettersen finished with a one-over-par 73 to match Ochoa (71) with an 11-under 277. Juli Inkster finished third at seven under after a 70.
